headline: How JPMorgan’s Security and Resilience Bet At JPMorgan Chase (JPM) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent weeks, JPMorgan Chase has unveiled a wide-ranging growth push, including a planned three-million-square-foot Canary Wharf headquarters in London, a decade-long US$10.00 billion Security and Resilience Initiative focused on defense and advanced manufacturing, and extensive new fixed‑income issuances across multiple maturities and structures. Alongside these moves, the bank is ramping up wealth management expansion and anti‑fraud efforts, signaling an emphasis on higher‑value...
